thread.title: Brooklyn man admits he killed wife, chopped up her body
thread.title_full: Brooklyn man admits he killed wife, chopped up her body

author: BENJAMIN KOCHMAN
title: Brooklyn man admits he killed wife, chopped up her body
text:
Brooklyn man admits he killed wife, chopped up her body Brooklyn man admits he killed wife, chopped up her body NEW YORK DAILY NEWS Friday, February 17, 2017, 5:30 PM 
A Brooklyn man was charged with murder after admitting he killed his wife and chopped up her body â€” but the location of her remains are a mystery, police said Friday. 
Phillip Martin, 42, was charged with murder and concealment of a human corpse. 
His wife, Diana Rodriguez-Martin, was reported missing Monday by worried relatives. 
The husband told relatives his wife moved out but later confessed to cops to killing her, a police source said. 
Martin has three prior arrests, two of them for attacking his wife, the source said. Tags:
